items.name: Intel Core i7-14700K
items.specs: 20 cores / 28 threads, up to 5.6 GHz, LGA 1700 socket
items.paragraph: The Intel Core i7-14700K delivers outstanding performance with its 20 cores and 28 threads, capable of speeds up to 5.6GHz. It’s ideal for gamers, streamers, and creators who demand fast multitasking and high-end computing power.

items.name: AMD Ryzen 7 7800X3D
items.specs: 8 cores / 16 threads, 5.0 GHz boost, AM5 socket
items.paragraph: The Ryzen 7 7800X3D features advanced 3D V-Cache technology, providing exceptional gaming performance and efficiency. With 8 cores and 16 threads, it’s one of the best CPUs for smooth gameplay and creative workloads.

items.name: AMD Ryzen 5 7600
items.specs: 6 cores / 12 threads, 5.1 GHz boost, AM5 socket
items.paragraph: Designed for solid all-around performance, the Ryzen 5 7600 delivers fast processing speeds with 6 cores and 12 threads. It’s perfect for gamers and content creators seeking a great balance between power and affordability.

items.name: Intel Core i5-14600K
items.specs: 14 cores / 20 threads, up to 5.3 GHz, LGA 1700 socket
items.paragraph: This CPU combines strong multi-core performance and energy efficiency, running up to 5.3GHz. Great for gaming and productivity, it’s a dependable choice for performance-focused PC builds.

items.name: Intel Xeon W7-2495X
items.specs: 24 cores / 48 threads, up to 4.8 GHz, LGA 4677 socket
items.paragraph: The Xeon W7-2495X is a workstation-grade CPU with 24 cores and 48 threads built for rendering, AI, and data-heavy applications. It ensures reliability and performance for professional computing environments.

items.name: AMD EPYC 9754
items.paragraph: With a massive 128 cores and 256 threads, the AMD EPYC 9754 is a powerhouse for servers and enterprise workloads. It’s engineered for high scalability, virtualization, and data center efficiency.

items.name: Intel Celeron G5905
items.paragraph: The Celeron G5905 offers reliable performance for basic computing tasks. Its 2 cores and 3.5GHz speed make it great for office use, browsing, and lightweight applications.

items.name: AMD Athlon 3000G
items.paragraph: A budget-friendly dual-core processor that delivers solid everyday performance. With integrated Radeon graphics, it’s ideal for home and entry-level gaming PCs.

items.name: Snapdragon X Elite
items.specs: 12 cores, up to 4.3 GHz, integrated Adreno GPU
items.paragraph: Built for mobility and efficiency, the Snapdragon X Elite features 12 cores and an integrated Adreno GPU. It provides exceptional performance for AI-driven tasks, laptops, and lightweight devices.

items.name: Apple M3 Max
items.paragraph: Apple’s M3 Max chip brings powerful performance with its 16-core CPU and 40-core GPU. Optimized for creative professionals, it offers blazing-fast speeds for design, video editing, and development.

items.name: MediaTek Dimensity 9300
items.paragraph: The Dimensity 9300 combines performance and efficiency using TSMC’s 4nm process. It’s made for flagship smartphones, offering lightning-fast speeds and great battery management.

items.name: Samsung Exynos 2400
items.paragraph: Samsung’s Exynos 2400 features a 10-core CPU and advanced Xclipse GPU for next-gen mobile gaming and photography. It delivers smooth multitasking and impressive energy efficiency.

items.name: Intel Pentium Gold G7400
items.paragraph: A dependable dual-core processor with speeds up to 3.7GHz. The Pentium Gold G7400 is a solid choice for budget desktops and office setups.

items.name: AMD FX-8350
items.paragraph: The AMD FX-8350 remains a classic choice for budget builders, featuring 8 cores and high clock speeds. It’s well-suited for multitasking, older games, and productivity use.

items.name: IBM Power10
items.specs: 15 cores / 30 threads, up to 4.0 GHz, enterprise socket
items.paragraph: The IBM Power10 is an enterprise-level CPU built for maximum reliability and scalability. It’s designed to handle complex workloads in data centers and cloud environments.

items.name: VIA Nano X2
items.paragraph: Compact and energy-efficient, the VIA Nano X2 offers dual-core performance for embedded and small computing systems. It’s a practical option for low-power applications.

items.name: ARM Neoverse N1
items.paragraph: The ARM Neoverse N1 delivers cloud-grade performance with 64 cores and 7nm efficiency. It’s perfect for servers and edge computing solutions requiring low latency and scalability.

items.name: Fujitsu SPARC64 XII
items.paragraph: Engineered for mission-critical operations, the SPARC64 XII offers 12 high-speed cores with enterprise reliability. It’s tailored for demanding business and industrial applications.

items.name: Intel Itanium 9700
items.paragraph: A high-end enterprise processor designed for stability and legacy systems. With 8 cores and 32MB cache, it excels in secure and data-intensive operations.

items.name: MIPS R4700
items.paragraph: A classic 64-bit CPU known for its efficiency and simplicity. The MIPS R4700 is often used in embedded devices, research projects, and educational environments.

items.name: Vengeance LPX 16GB (2×8) DDR4-3200
items.paragraph: Built for high performance, the Vengeance LPX DDR4 delivers fast and stable speeds for gaming and multitasking. Its low-profile aluminum heatspreader ensures cool and reliable operation even under heavy loads.

items.name: Dominator Platinum RGB DDR5 32GB (2×16)
items.paragraph: This premium DDR5 memory combines cutting-edge performance with vibrant RGB lighting. It’s designed for enthusiasts who want both top-tier speed and a striking look inside their PC.

items.name: Trident Z RGB 32GB (2×16)
items.paragraph: Known for its bold RGB design and high-speed performance, the Trident Z RGB DDR4 offers smooth multitasking and gaming. It’s ideal for users who want both beauty and power in one kit.

items.name: Trident Z5 RGB 32GB (2×16)
items.paragraph: Featuring lightning-fast DDR5 technology and sleek aesthetics, the Trident Z5 RGB ensures ultra-responsive performance. It’s built for next-gen systems that demand maximum speed and efficiency.

items.name: FURY Beast DDR4 16GB (2×8)
items.paragraph: The FURY Beast DDR4 offers a great balance of performance and price. With reliable speeds and easy plug-and-play setup, it’s perfect for gaming or everyday computing upgrades.

items.name: FURY Renegade DDR5 32GB (2×16)
items.paragraph: Designed for high-end gaming PCs, the FURY Renegade DDR5 delivers blazing-fast 6000 MT/s speeds. It also features dynamic RGB lighting and full XMP 3.0 support for optimal tuning.

items.name: DDR5-5200 UDIMM (CT32G52C42U5)
items.paragraph: Crucial’s DDR5 memory offers improved bandwidth and efficiency for modern CPUs. It’s non-RGB, making it a reliable and straightforward choice for professional and workstation builds.

items.name: T-FORCE Delta RGB DDR4 16GB (2×8)
items.specs: 3200 MT/s, CL16, RGB lightbar, aluminum heatspreader
items.paragraph: The T-FORCE Delta RGB stands out with its striking lightbar design and dependable DDR4 speed. Perfect for gamers who want style without compromising stability.

items.name: T-FORCE XTREEM ARGB DDR4 32GB (2×16)
items.paragraph: Built for serious performance, this memory kit provides low latency and bright ARGB effects. It’s a premium choice for overclockers and performance enthusiasts.

items.name: OEM DDR5 32GB Module
items.paragraph: This OEM-grade DDR5 module delivers consistent and efficient performance. It’s ideal for system builders and professionals who need JEDEC-standard reliability.

items.name: XPG SPECTRIX D60G DDR4 16GB (2×8)
items.paragraph: The SPECTRIX D60G offers unique RGB coverage and solid DDR4 speed for gaming PCs. It’s both stylish and reliable, designed for users who like bold aesthetics.

items.name: XLR8 Gaming DDR4 16GB (2×8)
items.paragraph: PNY’s XLR8 Gaming memory provides stable 3200 MT/s performance and a gamer-inspired design. It’s a cost-effective upgrade for gaming desktops.

items.name: Viper Steel DDR4 16GB (2×8)
items.paragraph: This kit offers high performance with durable aluminum heatspreaders. The Viper Steel is built for gamers who value strength, speed, and reliability.

items.name: Hades RGB DDR4 16GB (2×8)
items.paragraph: With sleek RGB lighting and dependable speed, the Hades RGB is a great pick for style-conscious gamers. It balances aesthetics with consistent performance.

items.name: DDR4-3200 (CT16G4DFD832A)
items.paragraph: A simple and stable DDR4 module that provides dependable speed for office or home PCs. Perfect for users who prefer non-RGB, plug-and-play upgrades.

items.name: EVO X II DDR4 16GB (2×8)
items.paragraph: The EVO X II brings together RGB customization and solid 3200 MT/s performance. It’s a reliable choice for gamers seeking visual flair and speed.

items.name: FURY DDR4 16GB (2×8)
items.paragraph: Offering excellent performance with XMP support, the HyperX FURY DDR4 is built for smooth gaming and multitasking. Its plug-and-play design makes upgrading effortless.

items.name: Viper Venom DDR5 32GB (2×16)
items.paragraph: This DDR5 kit combines high speed and low latency with stunning RGB effects. It’s perfect for high-performance gaming and creative workflows.

items.name: LANCER RGB DDR5 32GB (2×16)
items.paragraph: The XPG LANCER RGB delivers exceptional speed and visual appeal. It’s optimized for DDR5 platforms, ensuring top performance in demanding tasks.

items.name: Vengeance DDR5 32GB (2×16)
items.paragraph: The Corsair Vengeance DDR5 offers fast and stable performance with a clean, minimalist design. It’s a reliable choice for builders looking for power without the RGB.

items.name: MX Keys
items.specs: Full-size or Mini layout, Bluetooth/Logi Bolt wireless, smart backlit, rechargeable Li-Po battery
items.paragraph: A premium wireless productivity keyboard designed for comfort and efficiency. Its smart backlighting, solid build, and multi-device connectivity make typing smooth and effortless for work or home setups.

items.name: G915 TKL
items.type: Wireless mechanical gaming keyboard (low-profile GL switches)
items.specs: Tenkeyless layout, LIGHTSPEED wireless + Bluetooth, per-key RGB, aircraft-grade aluminium
items.paragraph: This low-profile wireless mechanical keyboard offers ultra-fast LIGHTSPEED connectivity and per-key RGB lighting. Built with aircraft-grade aluminum, it delivers both precision and durability for competitive gaming.

items.name: Pro X
items.specs: TKL/full layout, hot-swappable GX switches (clicky/linear/tactile), Esports-oriented
items.paragraph: Engineered for esports, the Pro X keyboard features hot-swappable GX switches for personalized feel and performance. Its compact design and durable build make it a favorite among pro gamers.

items.name: Huntsman V3 Pro
items.type: Wireless analog optical mechanical gaming keyboard
items.specs: Gen-2 Analog Optical switches, adjustable actuation, rapid trigger, wireless
items.paragraph: The Huntsman V3 Pro offers next-generation analog optical switches for precise actuation and rapid response. Designed for serious gamers, it combines comfort, customization, and cutting-edge technology.

items.name: BlackWidow V3
items.specs: Full/TKL layout options, Razer Mechanical switches (Green/Yellow/Orange), Chroma RGB, aluminium top plate
items.paragraph: A classic mechanical keyboard with Razer’s signature Green and Yellow switches for tactile or linear typing. It offers bright RGB lighting and a durable aluminum frame perfect for everyday gaming.

items.name: K95 RGB PLATINUM
items.specs: Full-size, Cherry MX (Speed/other) switches, aluminium frame, per-key RGB, dedicated macro/media keys
items.paragraph: This flagship mechanical keyboard features per-key RGB, dedicated macro keys, and premium Cherry MX switches. Its robust aluminum frame ensures lasting performance for gamers and professionals.

items.name: K70 RGB MK.2
items.specs: Cherry MX (Red/Brown/Speed) switches, full-size, per-key RGB, braided cable, media controls
items.paragraph: The K70 MK.2 combines style and speed with its full RGB lighting and Cherry MX switches. It’s designed for competitive play with dedicated media keys and a detachable wrist rest for comfort.

items.name: Apex Pro
items.specs: OmniPoint adjustable actuation switches, advanced customization, OLED/Smart Display on some models
items.paragraph: The Apex Pro stands out with OmniPoint adjustable magnetic switches, letting users customize actuation for each key. Its OLED smart display adds real-time information right at your fingertips.

items.name: Alloy Origins
items.specs: HyperX mechanical switches (Aqua/Red), full aluminium body, per-key RGB, N-key rollover
items.paragraph: Crafted from aircraft-grade aluminum, the Alloy Origins features HyperX mechanical switches for reliable performance. It’s compact, durable, and perfect for gamers who value quality and simplicity.

items.name: K2
items.specs: 75% compact layout, Bluetooth/Wired USB-C, Mac/Windows keycaps, hot-swappable options
items.paragraph: A versatile 75% wireless keyboard that blends functionality and portability. It supports both Mac and Windows layouts and offers a satisfying typing experience with mechanical switches.

items.name: K6
items.specs: 65% layout, Bluetooth 5.1 / Wired USB-C, hot-swappable variants, compact footprint
items.paragraph: Compact and stylish, the K6 is a 65% wireless mechanical keyboard perfect for minimal setups. It supports Bluetooth and wired modes, offering flexibility for work and play.

items.name: One 2 Mini
items.specs: 60% layout, PBT double-shot keycaps, detachable USB-C cable, hardware macros
items.paragraph: This 60% mechanical keyboard is a favorite among enthusiasts for its build quality and PBT double-shot keycaps. Its small form factor and reliable switches make it ideal for compact desk spaces.

items.name: Anne Pro 2
items.specs: 60% layout, Bluetooth 5.0 / Wired USB-C, ~1900 mAh battery, PBT keycaps, NKRO
items.paragraph: The Anne Pro 2 offers wireless and wired modes with customizable RGB lighting. Its compact 60% layout and long battery life make it a go-to choice for gamers on the go.

items.name: VA87M (VA Series)
items.specs: 87-key TKL layout, Cherry MX switch options, PBT keycaps, premium build, typist focus
items.paragraph: A premium TKL keyboard with high-quality PBT keycaps and Cherry MX switches. It’s built for typists who appreciate comfort, craftsmanship, and a refined typing feel.

items.name: FC750R
items.specs: 87-key TKL layout, Cherry MX options, PBT double-shot keycaps, sound-dampening pads, high-quality stabilizers
items.paragraph: Renowned for its solid build and excellent sound dampening, the FC750R delivers a quiet and satisfying typing experience. Its PBT keycaps and high-quality stabilizers make it a favorite among professionals.

items.name: 3068B
items.specs: 65%/68% layout, Bluetooth 5.0 / 2.4G / Wired options, hot-swappable variants, RGB or white LED, Akko switches
items.paragraph: A wireless 65% mechanical keyboard offering multiple connection modes including Bluetooth and 2.4GHz. With stylish keycap designs and hot-swappable switches, it blends functionality and fun.

items.name: Model 4 Professional
items.specs: Full-size layout, Cherry MX variants (gold-plated contacts), oversized volume knob, USB hub, anodized aluminium top panel
items.paragraph: A full-size keyboard built for serious productivity, featuring Cherry MX switches and a premium aluminum top. It includes a large volume knob and USB hub, perfect for professional workspaces.

items.name: K552 Kumara
items.specs: 87-key compact/ TKL layout, Outemu Blue switches (or variant), LED/RGB backlight, metal + ABS build, budget friendly
items.paragraph: A budget-friendly TKL mechanical keyboard with durable metal construction and vibrant LED or RGB lighting. It’s an excellent entry-level choice for gamers seeking quality on a budget.

items.name: SK650
items.specs: Low-profile mechanical switches, compact form, RGB lighting, USB-C wired
items.paragraph: The SK650 offers a slim, low-profile design with responsive mechanical switches. Its RGB backlighting and USB-C connectivity make it a sleek addition to modern setups.

items.name: Vulcan 120 AIMO
items.specs: Full-size layout, Titan mechanical switches (tactile), anodized aluminium top plate, per-key AIMO RGB, detachable palm rest
items.paragraph: This mechanical keyboard features Titan switches for fast, tactile feedback and stunning AIMO RGB lighting. With a sturdy aluminum plate and detachable wrist rest, it’s built for comfort and endurance.
